recipesJson.name: Das ist Glühwein!
recipesJson.author: EdibleMalfunction
recipesJson.description: Glühwein is a holiday staple in Germany and Austria. The drink is a warm mulled red wine containing Cinnamon, Cloves, and Oranges.

reviews.text: Do you want to vape Gluhwein for some reason? If so, this is super on point. Absolutely nails the taste and mouthfeel of mulled wine. If you're interested in the profile at all, give this a shot. Seriously, spooky accurate.
